title: ‘I Was so on the Limit’: Mark Cavendish Retires with ‘Win’ at Singapore Criterium
content:
Mark Cavendish finally calls time on an illustrious career full of dizzy highs and sometimes dramatic lows in Singapore.

Read the full article at ‘I Was so on the Limit’: Mark Cavendish Retires with ‘Win’ at Singapore Criterium on Velo.
author: sstokes
